column1: Little Goat Diner////Service wasn't great. Despite telling the hostess we needed a high chair
column2: we were initially seated at a booth that could not accommodate a high chair (which lead to more waiting as they concurrently seated a party without kids at a high chair friendly table). I asked our server about the uniquely-titled "kimchee & bacon & eggs & pancakes Asian style breakfast tasty thing." She said that it was kimchee and eggs without further explanation. When asked if the dish included pancakes per the title
column4: but then said she thought so. I asked if I could sub out the bacon and she said she didn't know without an offer to investigate. I ended up with an Indian-themed breakfast burrito which was generally good
column5: although it included a bean salad that wasn't complementary or interesting.
